type.description:
IF PARAM IS NUMBER NEED TO CHOOSE ex: 1,1L,

    IF PARAM IS STRING NEED TO CHOOSE ex:Islombek,

    IF PARAM IS LOCALDATE NEED TO CHOOSE ex:2020.05.14,

    IF PARAM IS LOCALDATE NEED TO CHOOSE ex:2020.05.14 15:15:15,

    IF PARAM IS DATE OLD API NEED TO CHOOSE ex:2020.05.14 15:15:15,

    IF PARAM IS JSON NEED TO CHOOSE ex:Islombek,

    IF PARAM IS BOOL NEED TO CHOOSE ex:true, false
